name: Blobble Wars 2 (itch)
description:
A sequel to the 2009 Flash game "Blobble Wars". This game builds on the original adding many new levels, new tower types, and new strategic options. Through 50 varied levels your goal will be to conquer all of the towers on the map before your AI opponents can.

The controls are simple: click your tower and drag in the direction you want to aim. Hitting an enemy tower with your blobbles will capture it. Hitting a friendly tower will reinforce it.

The game has four difficulty modes. Easy mode is forgiving for a casual expereince. Impossible mode provides a challenge for even experienced players.
